Brit Care Dog Hair & Skin. Insect&Fish

Novinka

Superpremium Complete Food for Dogs. Hypoallergenic Grain-Free Formula rich in Insect for adult dogs of all breeds with sensitive, demanding skin and hair.

The natural combination of insect protein and fish gave rise to a delicate recipe with excellent nutritional properties. The use of alternative protein sources is also more environmentally friendly. Low CO2 footprint.

Insect - Novel protein & L.I.D. – excellent digestion - low risk of allergy
High in Omega -3 and Omega-6 – for healthy skin and shiny coat
Full Amino Acids profile – for strong muscels
Probiotics – immune system boost
Contains coconut oil - NO chicken fat
Variants
  • 1 kg
  • 3 kg
  • 12 kg

Where to buy?

Superpremium Complete Food for Dogs. Hypoallergenic Grain-Free Formula rich in Insect for adult dogs of all breeds with sensitive, demanding skin and hair.

Composition:

insects dehydrated (14%), white fish dehydrated (14%), yellow peas (14%), green peas (14%), dried apple pulp, pea protein, coconut oil (8%), white fish protein hydrolyzed (4%), brewer´s yeast, salmon oil (2%),  linseed (2%), eggs shells, glucosamine (0.02%), chondroitin sulphate (0.015%), fructo-oligosaccharides (0.012%), mannan-oligosaccharides (0.012%), Mojave yucca (0.01%), inulin (0.009%), dried milk thistle (0.005%), dried rosemary (0.005%), dried cloves (0.005%), dried citrus (0.005%), dried curcuma (0.005%), Lactobacillus acidophilus HA – 122 inactivated (15x109 cells/kg).

Analytical ingredients:

crude protein 25.0%, crude fat 13.0%, moisture 10.0%, crude ash 7.2%, crude fibre 3.2%, calcium 1.1%, phosphorus 0.5, sodium 0.25%.

Nutritional composition:

vitamin A (3a672a) 23,000 I.U., vitamin D3 (3a671) 1,800 I.U., vitamin E (3a700) 600 mg, vitamin C (3a312) 300 mg, choline chloride (3a890) 2,000 mg, L-carnitine (3a910) 550 mg, taurine (3a370) 1,500 mg, biotin  (3a880) 0.8 mg, vitamin B1 (3a821) 4 mg, vitamin B2 (3a825i) 8 mg, niacinamide (3a315) 25 mg, calcium-D-pantothenate (3a841) 20 mg, vitamin B6 (3a831) 3 mg, folic acid (3a316) 0.8 mg, vitamin B12 0.06 mg, zinc (3b606) 100 mg, iron (3b106) 90 mg, manganese (3b504) 45 mg, potassium iodide (3b201) 0.8 mg, copper (3b406) 18 mg, selenium (3b810) 0.2 mg. Omega 3:  0.7 %, Omega 6: 2.5 %, EPA (20:5 n-3) 0.25%, DHA (22:6 n-3) 0.2%. Contains natural antioxidants: tocopherol extracts from vegetable oil (1b306(i)), ascorbyl palmitate (1b304) & rosemary extract. 

Metabolizable energy:

3,620 kcal/kg
